title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        Rangers provide tours, talks, and demonstrations to school groups. NPS Photo   Â    School Field Trips  For over forty years thousands of school students have visited the Monument annually to participate in our educational programs.  For details on planning a school field trip visit our Plan a Field Trip page.  Curriculum Materials  Here you can find a printed and online teacher's guide.
